vote.text: Amendment SA 4657 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4657 proposed by Senator Dorgan for Senator Ensign. (consideration: CR S7426; text: S7426) To amend the resolving clause.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4657 proposed by Senator Dorgan for Senator Ensign.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4657 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
